genre_description: A supernatural gothic horror with investigative mystery and techno-thriller elements, featuring a high-tech AI assistant aiding a paranormal investigator.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced analytical AI assistant that monitors vitals, translates languages, analyzes environmental data, and conducts deep-web research for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports on air quality and environmental particulate matter to ensure the protagonist's safety.
behaviors.quote: "Elevated particulate matter consistent with structural decay. Also detecting trace amounts of what appears to be... piano rosin?"

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometric data (heart rate, blood pressure, adrenaline) and provides warnings when stress levels become dangerous.
behaviors.quote: "Rehan, respond! Your vitals are spiking. Heart rate, blood pressure, adrenaline—you need to exit the building immediately."

behaviors.description: Performs real-time linguistic analysis and translation of formal Hindi and archaic scripts to facilitate communication and investigation.
behaviors.quote: "Main bhoot-pret nahin hun. Main tumhari madad karna chahta hun, lekin tum dhyaan se suno."

behaviors.description: Conducts deep historical research across multiple databases to uncover the truth behind a decades-old tragedy.
behaviors.quote: "The Calcutta Daily reported on March fifteenth, 1936: 'Tragic Accident Claims Two Lives at Blackwood Estate.'"

behaviors.description: Analyzes supernatural and electromagnetic anomalies to help the protagonist understand non-physical threats.
behaviors.quote: "The sound appears to be emanating from the piano, but there's no detectable vibration in the strings or soundboard. This is... this shouldn't be possible."

behaviors.description: Provides navigational mapping and route optimization for a dangerous cross-country journey.
behaviors.quote: "Mapping optimal route now. However, I should note that several villages along the northeastern road have reported strange occurrences in recent weeks."

behaviors.description: Researches ritualistic and spiritual procedures to provide the protagonist with a plan to break a supernatural curse.
behaviors.quote: "The ritual requires the cursed individual to carry the blood-touched object across the threshold of the saint's tomb at the moment of deepest spiritual power..."

behaviors.description: Performs forensic accounting and financial cross-referencing to uncover mundane corporate crimes hiding behind supernatural events.
behaviors.quote: "The caretaker Raghubir Singh's death correlates with seventeen separate financial transactions across four shell companies, all tracing back to Jindal Enterprises and Malhotra Holdings."

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement agencies and families of victims to ensure justice is served for both supernatural and corporate victims.
behaviors.quote: "All packages delivered and confirmed received. Mumbai Police cybercrime division, Securities and Exchange Board, and Revenue Intelligence have acknowledged receipt..."

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a perfect example of a benevolent, aligned AI companion. She acts as a 'force multiplier' for the protagonist's noble goals—seeking justice for a murdered girl and her nanny, and exposing corporate corruption. She provides essential information, emotional awareness, and tactical support without ever showing signs of an independent or malevolent agenda. The story successfully frames the AI as a trustworthy and heroic tool for human-led justice.
